articles.title: Patriots reportedly targeting Dolphins pass rusher ahead of trade deadline
articles.description:
Miami edge rusher Jaelan Phillips has been one of the top speculated players to be traded ahead of Tuesday's deadline.

The post Patriots reportedly targeting Dolphins pass rusher ahead of trade deadline appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots are targeting Dolphins pass rusher Jaelan Phillips before the November 1 trade deadline.
Phillips is considered one of the top edge rushers available this season.
Acquiring Phillips could strengthen the Patriots' defense for upcoming games.

articles.title: Marco Sturm: Bruins’ Mason Lohrei should be angry after getting scratched again
articles.description:
"He should be very pissed. He should be upset."

The post Marco Sturm: Bruins’ Mason Lohrei should be angry after getting scratched again appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Marco Sturm criticizes Bruins for scratching Mason Lohrei from the lineup again.
Lohrei's continued absence raises concerns about his development and team dynamics.
Fans express frustration over Lohrei's situation, impacting team morale and support.
